title: Tough on two wheels
creator_credit: Film Partnership and Central Office of Information
brief_description: Motor-cycles and the people who ride them, showing the variety of ways in which motor-cycles are used in Britain from everyday uses for business and pleasure to the thrills of the speedway and the Wall of Death. Includes sequences of the Isle of Man, T.T., Silverstone and the 1954 International Six Days Trial.
